summary: Sinister things begin happening to kidnappers who are holding a young boy for ransom in a remote cabin.
cast: Jennifer Shirley|Blake Woodruff|Michael Rooker|Josh Holloway|Sarah Wayne Callies|Julian Christopher|Teryl Rothery|Rod Boss|Roman Sodermans|Trevor Woodruff|Tara Wilson|Brad Sihvon|Joel Edgerton|John Kapelos|Dulé Hill|Claire Riley|Aidan Williamson|Rekha Sharma|Cory Monteith|Brandy Kopp|Kevin MacKenzie|Cainan Wiebe|Mark McConchie|Shannon Hand|Art Kitching|Elizabeth Bowen|Erika-Shaye Gair|Connor Christopher Levins|Megan McKinnon|Robert Musnicki
title: Hellion - El ángel caído
